article.title: Blankenberg Lab is hiring post-docs
article.tease: Work at one of the best research hospitals in the world
article.content:
[](https://www.postdocjobs.com/posting/7048061/)

The Blankenberg Lab in the Genomic Medicine Institute at the Cleveland Clinic Lerner Research Institute has several Postdoctoral Fellowships available. We utilize high-throughput omics technologies, such as next generation sequencing, and data-intensive computing to explore biomedical research questions.

Interested? See the Galaxy is Hiring page for the full posting (and for other openings too).
